info.title: Soundpiece API
info.description: API for AI-powered music generation, MIDI creation, vocal/instrumental separation, TTS, remixing, key/BPM detection, metadata extraction, and audio analytics.

schema.title: The format to download the asset in
Whether to wait for up to 20s for the computation to finish. Allows long polling

asset_id.title: The ID of an asset in the system

asset_ids.title: The IDs of the assets generated by this computation

url.title: The url that will be called when the computation is complete

context.title: A context dictionary that will be passed unchanged to the callback url

raw_midi.title: The midi data generated by this computation

url.title: A publicly accessible URL that returns an audio file in mp3 or wav format

copyright_declaration.title: Copyright declaration
copyright_declaration.description:
Setting this to true asserts that you agree to the following:
            
            I declare that I am the copyright owner of the material referenced; or have permission from the owner
            to upload it. I confirm it does not infringe the rights of others and accept responsibility for any 
            claims arising from its use.
